entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
